extension.name: Related Permissions Module
extension.description: This makes the relationship permission tick work as a full ACL. In combination with access CiviCRM contacts can be found in search etc
extension.comments: This extension makes the permission flag on a relationship work as a true ACL. In core CiviCRM that flag only allows the user to see the contact dashboard. However, in many cases it is a useful mechanism to give people permission to view contact records and search for contacts.
